    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        @CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping(value="/category",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getCategories()
        This api is used to handle requests which wants to get categories of questions from the elastic search. The search operations is done over question index that stores all questions.
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity object to the client.

      • getQuestionDetails

        @CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping(value="/category/{category}/questions",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getQuestionDetails​(@PathVariable
                                                                                    java.lang.String category)
        This api is used to get questions and their options which are related to the given category. It searchs for question details in question index .
        Parameters:
        category - this information indicates question category to group all questions.
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity object to the client.

      • saveAnswers

        @CrossOrigin
@PostMapping("/answers/save/{category}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> saveAnswers​(@PathVariable
                                                                             java.lang.String category,
                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                             java.lang.String answerDetails)
        This api is used to save answers sent by the user which is related to given category. It stores all given answers to answer index .
        Parameters:
        category - this information indicates question category to group all questions.
        answerDetails - it is an object that stores all answers sent for the given category and the nickname of the user.
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity object to the client.

      • getAnswers

        @CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping(value="/answers/{nickname}",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getAnswers​(@PathVariable
                                                                            java.lang.String nickname)
        This api is used to get answers sent by the given nickname of the user. It searchs for answers in answer index of elasticsearch.
        Parameters:
        nickname - it is the nickname of the user which sends answers. nickname attribute must be unique and it is also used to form index id.
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity object to the client.
